PPLoc: www.contactps.net  (link at the bottom of the web page)
activities: CPS is a global directory powered by business relationships.  The application provides preset taxonomy so that a business can define it goods and/or services along functional lines.  It allows employees to establish private mutually agreeable connections to other employees at various registered companies.   CPS was conceived with the privacy of individual information, however limited in this application, of primary importance.  CPS is developed as an Enterprise Application, therefore careful thought was made to balance the needs of the Company while protecting employee information, specifically their relationships with other employees at other companies or Entities.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms:
none at this time
(data is encrypted and secure)
recoursemech: Arbitration in the State of Oregon as stated in the Terms of Use Statement;  American Arbitration Association
